name: Bloat Bodhi
short_description:
A big disk full of Bodhi Linux and apps. A non pae setup for older machines. Pre config of Samba with gui, gigolo to connect to your home network.

Libre Office, Firefox,BackInTime,FileZilla and lots more.

apache,MySql etc. Ready for everyday use.

Languages: English, german, italian, portuguese, turkish, spanish, catalan,french, dutch.

Login/Password for PhpMyAdmin is root/bodhi.

Update 15.09.2014

As Jeff announced to stop the further developement of Bodhi here my last personal remaster that gets security updates from Unbuntu until 2017. I still install it on lower specs hardware, the livecycle should be the same as the OS.

New Remaster with all updates until today.

On the livedisk use the user custom w/o password

Cant get the file on SF Servers atm, please be patient.
summary: A bloated non pae Bodhi Linux
